title: Personality
description: Defines a personality for regular villagers.

id.description: The internal identification code for this item. Must be unique.

voice.description: The name of the voice clip library for this item. Must have two entries, one for male and one for female.

base.description: The basic two-letter name of the ACNH personality that best matches this item.

name.description: The user-readable name of this item. May not actually be used in-game.
